i:doc.i:header: Path: cs.utexas.edu!geraldo.cc.utexas.edu!ausnews.austin.ibm.com!uunet!in5.uu.net!jump.net!jump.net!news-fw!news.mpd!newsgate.tandem.com!su-news-feed1.bbnplanet.com!su-news-hub1.bbnplanet.com!news.bbnplanet.com!feta.direct.ca!newsfeed.direct.ca!infeed1.internetmci.com!newsfeed.internetmci.com!152.163.199.19!portc03.blue.aol.com!newstf02.news.aol.com!audrey01.news.aol.com!not-for-mail From: victina01@aol.com (Victina01) Newsgroups: austin.jobs Subject: TX-AUSTIN: PC SAS/MAINFRAME/ON-LINE SUPPORT-VICTINA Date: 28 Aug 1997 15:21:01 GMT Lines: 39 Message-ID: 19970828152101.LAA06924@ladder01.news.aol.com> NNTP-Posting-Host: ladder01.news.aol.com X-Admin: news@aol.com Organization: AOL http://www.aol.com SnewsLanguage: English Xref: cs.utexas.edu austin.jobs:119818
i:doc.i:body:
VICTINA SYSTEMS INTERNATIONAL
Victina is an Austin/Dallas based Information Systems Consulting Company. We specialize in working with both our employees and customers for maximum satisfaction.
LOCATION: Austin, TX
SKILLS:
-Experience in conducting feasibility studies. -Experience developing systems containing large amounts of data. -Experience with mainframe and PC SAS. -Experience developing on-line transaction processing client/sever applications. -Experience in deploying client/server applications in a network environment. -Experience designing relational databases -Experience with Fishery databases -Relevant and recent experience in successfully providing contract programming services. -Operating systems: Solaris and UNIX
Please email resumes to (victina01@aol.com)
Victina Systems International 3532 Bee Caves Road, Suite 202 Austin, Texas 78746 Fax: (512) 327-1651
VICTINA SYSTEMS INT'L
